msg: add comments about current implementation of block-container object, submitted by Chris Bowditch [bowditch_chris@hotmail.com]; see

author: gmazza
msg: 1.  Partial implementation of fo:region-xxx and background-color property
2.  ColorType has a new getAWTColor() method, also alpha() function renamed
to getAlpha(). Definition of Alpha values switched to make consistent with
java.awt.Color (i.e., 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque).
to lesson confusion (FOP has three types of viewports--
Page, Region, and Block--handleViewportTraits() was only good for Region.)

author: gmazza
msg: Document paging within AWTRenderer & PreviewDialog activated (no content yet, just blank pages).
